name: mikroe.click.gyro9
short_description: Gyro 9 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a high-performance gyroscope. This board features the A3G4250D, a MEMS motion sensor from STMicroelectronics. It is a low-power 3-axes digital output gyroscope that provides unprecedented stability at zero rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time and is equipped with an embedded temperature sensor. The gyroscope has a 16-bit rate value data output with an 8-bit compensation temperature data output.
